Downtown Center-Leroy St Shuttle

DCL Outbound Description:

The Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound leaves campus and travels through Riverside Drive in Johnson City & Binghamton and Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton enroute to the University Downtown Center.


DCL Inbound Description:

The Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton and Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: All Inbound buses at the University Downtown Center return to campus.

DCL Outbound

with service to:

• Riverside Drive in Johnson City & Binghamton

• Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton

• University Downtown Center in Downtown Binghamton

DCL Inbound

with service to:

• Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton

• Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City

• Binghamton University

Late Nite Downtown Center-Leroy St Shuttle

Late Nite DCL Outbound Description:

The Late Nite Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound leaves campus and travels through Riverside Drive in Johnson City & Binghamton and Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton enroute to State & Hawley Streets in Downtown Binghamton.


Reminder: The Late Nite DCL Outbound ONLY operates on Friday and Saturday nights from 12:25 A.M. to 3:05 A.M.


Late Nite DCL Inbound Description:

The Late Nite Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound leaves Downtown Binghamton - State & Hawley Streets and travels through Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton and Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: The Late Nite DCL Inbound ONLY operates on Friday and Saturday nights from 1:10 A.M. to 3:40 A.M.

Late Nite

DCL Outbound

with service to:

• Riverside Drive in Johnson City & Binghamton

• Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton

• State & Hawley Streets in Downtown Binghamton

Late Nite

DCL Inbound

with service to:

• Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton

• Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City

• Binghamton University
